birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省大连市庄河市吴炉镇光华村

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省武汉市

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，实德集团与实德系的创始人。曾与薄熙来家族关系密切，后因薄熙来事件被判刑，在狱中因心肌梗死去世。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Shide Group and the 'Shide system' in Chinese football. He had close ties with Bo Xilai's family, was later sentenced in the Bo Xilai case, and died of a myocardial infarction in prison.

description.zh-cn: 由徐明创立的集团公司，业务涵盖化学建材、石化、金融保险、文化体育等领域。
description.en: A conglomerate founded by Xu Ming, with business covering chemical building materials, petrochemicals, finance and insurance, culture and sports.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任大连市长等职。徐明在1990年代与其结识并关系密切，后徐明成为其案件的主要行贿者。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the mayor of Dalian. Xu Ming became acquainted with him in the 1990s and maintained a close relationship, later becoming the main briber in his corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 指涉及前中共中央政治局委员薄熙来的一系列政治事件。徐明是该案的主要行贿者和关键证人，并因此案被调查和判刑。
description.en: Refers to a series of political incidents involving former Politburo member Bo Xilai. Xu Ming was the main briber and a key witness in the case, and was investigated and sentenced as a result.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政府官员，与薄熙来关系密切。徐明曾向其直系亲属赠送房产。
description.en: A former Chinese government official with close ties to Bo Xilai. Xu Ming gifted real estate to his immediate family members.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来的妻子。徐明曾与她关系密切并资助其家庭活动。
description.en: Wife of Bo Xilai. Xu Ming had a close relationship with her and funded her family's activities.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与谷开来之子。徐明曾资助其海外考察学校。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai and Gu Kailai. Xu Ming once funded his school inspection trip abroad.

description.zh-cn: 一种急性、严重的心脏病。据报道，徐明在狱中因急性心肌梗死去世。
description.en: An acute, severe heart condition. Xu Ming reportedly died in prison from an acute myocardial infarction.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省大连市下辖的县级市，是徐明的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Dalian, Liaoning province, China. It is the birthplace of Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省省会。徐明在此地服刑并最终去世。
description.en: The capital of Hubei Province, China. Xu Ming served his prison sentence and eventually died here.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国沈阳市的大学。徐明曾在此就读国际贸易专业的成人教育班。
description.en: A university located in Shenyang, China. Xu Ming attended its adult education program for International Trade.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国大连市的大学。徐明在此获得商业经济硕士学位。
description.en: A university located in Dalian, China. Xu Ming obtained his Master's degree in Commercial Economics here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。徐明是其党员。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China. Xu Ming was a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，据资料显示为徐明的配偶。
description.en: A Chinese actress, listed as the spouse of Xu Ming.

description.zh-cn: 徐明的胞兄。
description.en: The elder brother of Xu Ming.

zh-cn: 大连万达实德足球俱乐部队

description.zh-cn: 一家前中国职业足球俱乐部，由实德集团在1999年从万达集团手中全面接手，曾是中国足坛的霸主。该俱乐部于2012赛季结束后解散。
description.en: A former Chinese professional football club, fully taken over by Shide Group from Wanda Group in 1999, which once dominated Chinese football. The club was dissolved after the 2012 season.

description.zh-cn: 指由徐明和实德集团在中国足球联赛中建立的，通过控股或关联关系拥有多个足球俱乐部的体系。
description.en: Refers to the system established by Xu Ming and Shide Group in the Chinese football league, which owned multiple football clubs through holding or affiliated relationships.

description.zh-cn: 2004年，由徐明联合七家中国足球超级联赛俱乐部向中国足协发起的改革运动，要求“政企分开、管办分离”。
description.en: A reform movement initiated in 2004 by Xu Ming, leading seven Chinese Super League clubs to pressure the Chinese Football Association for 'separation of government and enterprise, and separation of administration and management'.

description.zh-cn: 中国足球运动的管理机构。
description.en: The governing body for football in China.

nodes.id: 大连人职业足球俱乐部

zh-cn: 大连人职业足球俱乐部

description.zh-cn: 一家位于大连的职业足球俱乐部。2012赛季结束后，该俱乐部接收了宣告解散的大连实德足球俱乐部的资产。
description.en: A professional football club based in Dalian. After the 2012 season, the club acquired the assets of the dissolved Dalian Shide Football Club.

description.zh-cn: 徐明出生于辽宁省大连市庄河市吴炉镇光华村。
description.en: Xu Ming was born in Guanghua Village, Wulu Town, Zhuanghe City, Dalian, Liaoning Province.

degree.en: Adult Education Class in International Trade

description.zh-cn: 徐明毕业于沈阳航空工业学院（现沈阳航空航天大学）国际贸易专业成教班。
description.en: Xu Ming graduated from the adult education program in International Trade at Shenyang Institute of Aeronautical Engineering (now Shenyang Aerospace University).

description.zh-cn: 徐明毕业于东北财经大学，获得商业经济硕士学位。
description.en: Xu Ming graduated from Dongbei University of Finance and Economics with a Master's degree in Commercial Economics.

description.zh-cn: 徐明是中国致公党党员。
description.en: Xu Ming was a member of the China Zhi Gong Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，徐明于2006年至2015年间与田海蓉为夫妻关系。
description.en: According to records, Xu Ming was married to Tian Hairong from 2006 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: 徐斌是徐明的胞兄。
description.en: Xu Bin is Xu Ming's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，徐明通过受让股份全面控制了公司，并将其发展为实德集团。
description.en: In 1999, Xu Ming gained full control of the company through a share transfer and developed it into the Shide Group.

description.zh-cn: 自1992年起，徐明与时任大连市长的薄熙来及其家庭往来密切。
description.en: Starting in 1992, Xu Ming had a close relationship with Bo Xilai, then mayor of Dalian, and his family.

description.zh-cn: 徐明在薄熙来案庭审中被指控多年来向薄熙来行贿两千多万元人民币。
description.en: During the trial of Bo Xilai's case, Xu Ming was accused of bribing Bo Xilai with over 20 million RMB over many years.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，徐明出资陪同谷开来和薄瓜瓜赴英国考察学校。
description.en: In 1998, Xu Ming funded and accompanied Gu Kailai and Bo Guagua on a trip to the UK to inspect schools.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，徐明出资陪同谷开来和薄瓜瓜赴英国考察学校。
description.en: In 1998, Xu Ming funded and accompanied Gu Kailai and Bo Guagua on a trip to the UK to inspect schools.

description.zh-cn: 徐明曾赠送王立军直系亲属两套位于北京的房产，价值285万元人民币。
description.en: Xu Ming gifted two properties in Beijing, valued at 2.85 million RMB, to Wang Lijun's immediate family members.

description.zh-cn: 因涉及薄熙来案，徐明于2012年被调查，后被判刑入狱，并最终在狱中去世。
description.en: Due to his involvement in the Bo Xilai case, Xu Ming was investigated in 2012, subsequently sentenced to prison, and ultimately died while incarcerated.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月4日，徐明据报因急性心肌梗死在武汉狱中去世。
description.en: On December 4, 2015, Xu Ming reportedly died of an acute myocardial infarction in a Wuhan prison.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，实德集团从万达集团手中全面接手大连万达队，并更名为大连实德足球俱乐部。
description.en: In 1999, Shide Group took over the Dalian Wanda team from Wanda Group and renamed it Dalian Shide Football Club.

description.zh-cn: 徐明在中国足坛中一手打造了通过控股或关联关系拥有多个足球俱乐部的“实德系”。
description.en: Xu Ming single-handedly created the 'Shide system' in Chinese football, which owned multiple football clubs through holding or affiliated relationships.

description.zh-cn: 2004年，徐明联合其他六家俱乐部向中国足协施压，要求改革，被称为“G7革命”。
description.en: In 2004, Xu Ming united with six other clubs to pressure the Chinese Football Association for reforms, an event known as the 'G7 Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: G7革命向中国足球协会施压，要求建立以“政企分开、管办分离”为目标的联赛新秩序。
description.en: The G7 Revolution pressured the Chinese Football Association to establish a new league order with the goal of 'separation of government and enterprise, and separation of administration and management'.

relationships.source: 大连人职业足球俱乐部

description.zh-cn: 2012年中国足球超级联赛赛季结束后，实德集团将俱乐部资产整体转让给大连阿尔滨（后更名为大连人职业足球俱乐部），导致大连实德足球俱乐部不复存在。
description.en: After the 2012 Chinese Super League season, Shide Group transferred the club's assets to Dalian Aerbin (later renamed Dalian Professional F.C.), leading to the dissolution of Dalian Shide Football Club.
